about_the_game:
The 9th character to join the TFH roster is Stronghoof the Reindeer. Conjure an arsenal of icy, magical weaponry and fight alongside his muscly winter sprite Vetr!

Details

This DLC includes:
  • Additional Playable Character: "Stronghoof”
  • New Stage: Reine Ramparts
  • Stronghoof Pixel Lobby Avatar

Note

  • This product is included in the Season 1 Pass. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
  • This item requires the base game (sold separately) to be used.
detailed_description:
The 9th character to join the TFH roster is Stronghoof the Reindeer. Conjure an arsenal of icy, magical weaponry and fight alongside his muscly winter sprite Vetr!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3 550 Integrated graphics chipset or equivalent.
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU (Nvidia or AMD) with at least 750MB of VRAM strongly recommended
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3 550 Integrated graphics chipset or equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU (Nvidia or AMD) with at least 750MB of VRAM strongly recommended
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game Them’s Fightin’ Herds on Steam in order to play.
